parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.14

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of objects attached to the given object.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''attachedObjects''' obj

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]] - given object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s attached to the given object
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{
  [[detach]] _x;
} [[forEach]] [[attachedObjects]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[count]] [[attachedObjects]] [[player]] == 0) [[then]] {
  [[hint]] "There are no objects attached to player";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[attachObject]], [[attachTo]], [[attachedTo]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[triggerAttachVehicle]], [[attachedObject]], [[detach]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
